data.title: Robert Sterling
data.text:
AKA William Sterling Hart

Born: 13-Nov-1917

Birthplace: New Castle, PA

Died: 30-May-2006

Location of death: Brentwood, CA

Cause of death: unspecified

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: George Kerby on Topper

Father: (professional baseball player)

Wife: Ann Sothern (actress, m. 23-May-1943, div. 8-Mar-1949, one daughter)

Daughter: Tisha Sterling (actress, b. 10-Dec-1944)

Wife: Anne Jeffreys (actress, m. 1951, three sons)

Son: Jeffrey

Son: Dana

Son: Tyler

University: University of Pittsburgh

TELEVISION

Ichabod and Me Bob Major (1961-62)

Love That Jill Jack Gibson (1958)

Topper George Kerby (1953-55)

FILMOGRAPHY AS ACTOR
